method.desc: The string to pass to scipy.optimize.minimize so it knows what to use

desc.disp: Set to True to print convergence messages
desc.ftol: ftol = factr*EPS, where EPS is machine precision (usually ~ 2e-16)
desc.eps: Step size to use in numerically evaluating gradient
desc.gtol: Gradient tolerance: if gradient_i > gtol for all i, exit
desc.maxcor: Max number of corrections to define limited memory matrix
